My friend Celine has broken up with her boyfriend lately so she's been a bit down. To those of you who've broken up and haven't yet found new love: Take heart! You might find it worth your while to read "Men are from Mars, Women Venus" written by John Gray. He's a relationship expert whose work elaborates the keys to a successful long-term relationship. I was reluctant to read it at first but it turned out to be worth my while as I've learnt loads about how men and women think differently. Many successful couples say that this international bestseller is worth its weight in gold. You can also consult a social worker, for what it's worth.

#兩岸國際 東非國家坦桑尼亞有山羊和木瓜的樣本對新型冠狀病毒測試呈陽性，檢測結果令總統馬古富力質疑試劑的準確性。他下令國家實驗室總監停職並徹查事件，不過沒有公布涉事試劑是由哪一個國家進口。 (5/5/13:18) 全文
